mapper.select: select distinct CONCAT('雨量监测(',t.sensor_id,')点') from out_rain t order by t.sensor_id;
select distinct t.sensor_id from out_rain t order by t.sensor_id;
select t.value from out_rain t where t.sensor_id=#{sensorId}
select date_format(t.datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') from out_rain t where t.sensor_id=#{0} order by t.datetime;
SELECT distinct DATE_FORMAT(t.datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') FROM out_rain t

select t.value from out_rain t where t.sensor_id=#{0} and unix_timestamp(t.datetime) > unix_timestamp(DATE_FORMAT(#{1},'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i')) and unix_timestamp(t.datetime) < unix_timestamp(DATE_FORMAT(#{2},'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i'));
